teacher_info.intro:
I have Master’s degree in Translation (English, Ukrainian, Greek) and my native languages are Russian and Ukrainian. My passion for languages started long ago when I was a child and my passion for teaching started when I was still at school and worked as a tutor for smaller children, teaching them English.

I also like to travel a lot around the world and meet different people, that’s why I’m learning other foreign languages. I always get inspired by people who learn foreign languages, especially Russian and Ukrainian, as these are one of the most difficult languages in the world, well, probably after Japanese, Chinese and Arabic :)
teacher_info.introduction:
Hi, everyone!
Welcome to my page!
I will be glad to become your teacher of English, Russian or Ukrainian. 
So, let me tell you a few words about me.

I have Master’s degree in Translation (English, Ukrainian, Greek) and my native languages are Russian and Ukrainian. My passion for languages started long ago when I was a child and my passion for teaching started when I was still at school and worked as a tutor for smaller children, teaching them English.

I’m constantly developing and improving my teaching skills by trying out different techniques on myself first, as I’m a language learner as well. So, everything I find that could help my students become more fluent I share it immediately. So, be ready that you will speak very fast if you follow my instructions :))  

I also like to travel a lot around the world and meet different people, that’s why I’m learning other foreign languages. I always get inspired by people who learn foreign languages, especially Russian and Ukrainian, as these are one of the most difficult languages in the world, well, probably after Japanese, Chinese and Arabic :) 

So, what will you learn from my professional lessons:
Grammar (I give all Grammar materials, that you can use in the future)
Vocabulary (I also use some applications, which will help you learn the words faster)
Reading (We will read a lot of different texts from simple to more complicated)
Speaking (We will speak every time, as much as possible)
Writing (You will get some home tasks to do)
Guess what? You will get it all at once! Yes, that’s right, I combine everything so that there is as much practice as possible. I’m very exacting teacher if it goes about your success at my lessons, so be ready for hard, BUT successful work ;)

Well, if you still have questions you can contact me for more details. 
If you have doubts you can book a trial lesson, to see if my teaching style suits you.

See you soon on the lessons!

teacher_info.intro: Переезд в англоязычную страну,  путешествия, общение с англоговорящими зятем и внуками - много и других ситуаций, когда без знания иностранного языка очень трудно. Я с удовольствием помогу вам быстро начать говорить. У меня очень  большой опыт преподавания,  в том числе онлайн. Я имею степень бакалавра по английскому и магистра по лингвистике. Российский диплом подтверждён в США. Но главное - многолетняя практика преподавания и любовь к своему делу! А если вам интересно, с удовольствием поделюсь своим опытом жизни в США. I have a BA in English and an MA in Linguistics. I’m a skilled English and Russian teacher and English-Russian, Russian-English translator with 30+ years of experience.
teacher_info.introduction:
Если вы переехали в англоязычную страну, как я, или просто любите путешествовать, вам необходимо учить иностранный язык. Не теряйте время и обращайтесь  ко мне. У меня большой опыт и я знаю, как вам помочь. Имею степень бакалавра по английскому и магистра по лингвистике. Российский диплом подтверждён в США. Но главное - многолетняя практика преподавания и любовь к своему делу! А если вам интересно, с удовольствием поделюсь своим опытом жизни в США. Буду благодарна, если, запрашивая первый урок, вы напишите мне пару слов о себе: уровень знания языка, цель изучения и все, что сочтете нужным для наших занятий. 
I have a BA in English and an MA in Linguistics. I’m a skilled English and Russian teacher and English-Russian, Russian-English translator with 30+ years of experience. I have educated non-English speakers in English fundamentals, basic grammar and speaking skills as well as technical translation. I have also provided conversational and grammar practice to the learners of Russian. Being fluent in both languages I can introduce and explain new material in a clear way and answer any question you have using your first language which is in many cases much more efficient and makes things faster. I use brain-friendly materials and I try to create a fun and motivating environment in my classes. I’ve worked with students of various ages. Many of my students have been schoolchildren, who needed help. All of them improved their skills and had much better results at school after my classes. Many have needed English for their work, to build relationships, travel, visit their friends and relatives abroad. I am good at introducing and explaining new material in a clear way. Both the content and the length of your course can be flexible and adapted to your personal learning goals. I’ll help you to be more fluent and more confident in the language you learn.

teacher_info.intro:
Всем привет! Меня зовут Ксения, я являюсь преподавателем русского и немецкого как иностранного и русского для билингвов. Мне интересно знакомиться с новыми людьми и помогать им в достижении их целей. 
Schon seit sechs Jahren lebe ich in Deutschland und beschäftige mich mit dem Thema Mehrsprachigkeit.
teacher_info.about_me:
Всем привет! Меня зовут Ксения, я являюсь преподавателем русского и немецкого как иностранного и русского для билингвов. Мне интересно знакомиться с новыми людьми и помогать им в достижении их целей. 
Schon seit sechs Jahren lebe ich in Deutschland und beschäftige mich mit dem Thema Mehrsprachigkeit.
teacher_info.about_teacher: По образованию я являюсь инженером и моим основным "языком" был язык химический формул. Переезд в Германию полностью изменил мою жизнь и я начала все больше интересоваться иностранными языками и их преподаванием. На данный момент я трудоустроена в одной из крупнейших языковых школ, но продолжаю развиваться профессионально и открыта к новым испытаниям.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Ich unterrichte Russisch und Deutsch gern auf Deutsch, aber auch komplett auf Russisch. Die Bedürfnisse meiner Schüler stehen für mich im Vordergrund. Manche meiner Schüler wollen sich auf Sprechen konzentrieren, andere - auf Grammatik. Da ich eine Menge von Materialien zur Verfügen habe, funktioniert das problemlos.

course_info.trial_description:
Während der Probestunde lernen wir uns kennen und Sie erzählen mir, welche Ziele Sie erreichen möchten, bzw. über welches Sprachniveau Sie bereits verfügen. Um Ihre Sprachkenntnisse präziser einschätzen zu können, gebe ich Ihnen einen kleinen Text in der jeweiligen Sprache zum Vorlesen und wir besprechen danach den Inhalt und das Vokabular. Zum Schluss bestimmen wir gemeinsam Ihre Lernziele und den Lernplan.

На пробном уроке мы познакомимся друг с другом и поговорим о Ваших целях изучения языка. Для того, чтобы более точно определить Ваш уровень владения иностранным языком, я предоставлю Вам для прочтения небольшой текст. Мы обсудим его содержание и незнакомые слова, а также составим план обучения.

pro_course_detail.title: Russisch für Anfänger
pro_course_detail.description: Während des Unterrichts arbeiten wir mit einem Lehrbuch, lernen Grammatik- und Ausspracheregeln, Übersetzung der russischen Dialoge ins Deutsche und machen Übungen dazu. Falls Sie noch keine Vorkenntnisse haben, zeige ich Ihnen gern, wie man das Kyrillische Alphabet effektiv lernen kann.

pro_course_detail.title: Немецкий для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description: Во время урока мы будем работать со множеством материалов: с интерактивными упражнениями, журналами, рабочими листами. Возможен вариант обучения по учебнику и рабочей тетради. Во время пробного урока мы обсудим с Вами, какая методика Вам ближе и выберем подходящие материалы.

pro_course_detail.title: Подготовка Deutsch-Test für Zuwanderer (DTZ)
pro_course_detail.description: Во время данного типа уроков мы готовимся к Deutsch-Test für Zuwanderer и проходим все блоки экзамена. Мы пройдёмся по списку наиболее важных тем для письменной и устной части и напишем письма по каждой из тем.

pro_course_detail.title: Немецкий для продолжающих

I enjoy to do both and I like to know more about culture and history of another countries. If you want to develop your speaking skills we will find many interesting topics of your interest or if you are just beginner I will help you start.

teacher_info.about_teacher: I like to learn new languages (I speak English and Turkish) so I can understand so good how a student feels and help you along the path from beginner to fluency. I also can help your kids develop their language skills, prepare business topics and other needs you have.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I will prepare every lesson before adapting content and lessons to yours specific goals. My lessons will  include all aspects for students. I will use different kind of format (Microsoft word, PDF, Microsoft power point, videos, audios, etc.) and together we will try to achieve the level you want.

course_info.trial_description: On trial lesson we will have the opportunity to meet and talk about your needs and how I will help you achieve your goals. I will prepare a lesson  and if you will like we can continue on this way.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Kazakh Language
pro_course_detail.description:
Hello and welcome to my lessons!  

First of all you need to know I prepare every lesson individually depending on needs and objectives you have. 

I adapt and prepare an individual learning plan to each student and focus more on grammar, speaking, pronunciation... or prepare more practical lessons focused on topics of your preference.  

Also If you want I will prepare homework for you depending on your availability to study by yourself and help you along the process of learning Kazakh language. 

Usually I teach the logic of Kazakh language and then we go to grammar where I explain systematically in an easy way to build sentences. Every lessons about a new topic and I include new vocabulary. We practice speaking in Kazakh using interesting topics for you.  

I introduce not just Kazakh language but also culture and characteristics of Kazakh people. For those who want to speak in Kazakh like natives I teach dialects and speaking style of different regions in Kazakhstan. 

I have students from USA, UK, Europe, China, etc so I am used to deal with some cultural aspects that can be challenging for you when learning Kazakh language. Also if you live in Kazakhstan and you already speak but want to do it better I can help you with that. 

I can teach you Kazakh in English, Russian and Turkish.

I guarantee  I will do my best so you will enjoy to learn Kazakh language with me.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Hello and welcome to my lessons! With me you will practice your Russian speaking skills. 
In every lesson you will learn new vocabulary and we can talk about any topic you want.

 I will correct your mistakes during the lesson and teach you to speak Russian in easy and correct way. 

 I will prepare speaking activities and interesting topics for you to make our lesson curious enjoyable to learn Russian.

Если вы говорите на татарском и хотите улучшить его, я предлагаю вам уроки чтения на татарском. Мы будем читать книги и отрывки из книг зарубежных и татарских писателей, изучать новые слова, обсуждать прочитанное. Бронируйте урок, будет интересно.

Сез татарча сөйләшәсез, ләкин яхшырак сөйләшергә телисез? Әйдәгез бергә татарча китаплар укыйбыз, яңа сүзләр өйрәнәбез, китапта укыган темага сөйләшәбез! Күңелле һәм файдалы дәрес булачак. Языгыз.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone! My name’s Christina and I teach Russian and Greek since 2013. I have both Greek and Russian roots and I’m a native speaker of both languages. I love foreign languages! I have already mastered English and I’m currently studying Japanese. I love meeting people from all over the world and learning about their culture! 
My hobbies are: chess, piano, martial arts, drawing, cinema and video games.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello everyone! My name’s Christina and I teach Russian and Greek since 2013. I have both Greek and Russian roots and I’m a native speaker of both languages. I love foreign languages! I have already mastered English and I’m currently studying Japanese. I love meeting people from all over the world and learning about their culture! 
My hobbies are: chess, piano, martial arts, drawing, cinema and video games.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Learning a foreign language is not only about learning grammar and vocabulary. You actually learn a new culture and a new way of thinking! I strongly believe that the students must have fun during the lesson as if their enjoying their hobbies! My top priority is to base the lessons on the individual goals and interests of each learner.
teacher_info.teaching_style:

As I am a passionate language learner as well, I know how difficult it is to learn a foreign language. I am a very patient teacher: I adapt my teaching methods, speed and style to your preferences, interests and needs. I use to teach internationally, so I have a very flexible timetable, teaching early in the morning, late at night as well as on weekends, holidays and during Christmas, Easter and Summer leaves.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I organize my classes so that you get an opportunity to train all the basic skills : you will listen to the spoken language, speak, read and write. I'll send you all the necessary material (in PDF and audio files) and we'll meet each other on one of your favorite apps: Skype, WhatsApp, Webex or any other of your preference.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for everyone (A1-C2). Herkes için Rusça. Ruso para todos. Russo per tutti.
pro_course_detail.description:
General Russian course for all levels is aimed to improve your Russian language skills in listening,  talking, reading, grammar, writing, and vocabulary development.
It covers reading, writing, speaking, listening, grammar, and vocabulary. You'll be able to improve your accuracy (how correct your Russian is) and fluency (how well you can communicate), as well as your pronunciation, reading skills (intonation. etc.), and ability to comprehend information. 
The better and more precisely you can express your ideas and thoughts, the more professional you sound and the better people will understand you. So, getting familiar with synonyms, antonyms, idioms, proverbs, and other useful expressions in the Russian language will enrich your vocabulary and make you feel comfortable and confident when not only talking to people and business partners, for ex., but, also, watching movies, reading books, listening to the news, etc.

Bu derslerde dilbilgisi, konuşma, okuma ve yazma olacak.

In this lesson we will talk a lot and practice the Russian language. Discussion of different topics + new words. After the lesson, I send a list of new words, the pronunciation of words, new phrases, the pronunciation of these phrases.

teacher_info.intro: My name is Anna, I'm a Russian language teacher and a YouTube blogger from Saint-Petersburg.
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello and welcome to my profile! My name is Anna, I'm a Russian language teacher and a YouTube blogger from Saint-Petersburg. 
I teach Russian for foreigners at the university; I also have my YouTube channel for learners of the Russian language, called Russian from Russia, and huge amount of materials for learning Russian on my website, including videos, texts and interactive exercises. 
I'm also a certified TRKI testor.
 I started offering lessons on iTalki a few months ago, and it was only informal tutoring. But later I've understood that some people prefer structured lessons. That's why today you can choose from two types of my guided lessons: structured professional lessons and informal tutoring. 
When I say "structured", I mean that I've designed programs for elementary, intermediate and advanced learners of Russian, and I'll guide you step by step through the Russian language acquisition. 
Informal tutoring is more like conversational practice, answering your questions, assisting with proofreading and other tasks you need. But whether you choose structured lessons or informal tutoring, you will be talking from our first lesson and we'll talk about what YOU want to talk about. 

During our lessons, you will get:

 - Relevant vocabulary for practical, everyday situations - and some TIPS on how to remember it;
 - LOGICAL explanation of Russian grammar;
- INTERACTIVE PERSONALIZED EXERCISES (for structured lessons);
 - A relevant, clear and ACCURATE FEEDBACK, to really perfect your Russian, to increase your motivation, and to learn the language within the shortest possible period of time.

 I believe that it's absolutely essential to have notes after each language session. We'll use Google docs during our lessons, and you'll have the notes from each class, with some comments. These notes are your study material to revise later. I'll even share with you some tips on how you can easily have audio notes after each class, if you wish.
 Hope to see you soon, Anna
teacher_info.about_me: My name is Anna, I'm a Russian language teacher and a YouTube blogger from Saint-Petersburg.
teacher_info.about_teacher: In the last 15 years, I’ve been teaching Russian both at the university and online, on a daily basis, in groups and one-to-one. In addition, I am a person behind Russian from Russia youtube channel and Russian Verbs from Russia audiopodcast; they are absolutely different from all the other youtube channels and podcasts for learners of Russian (you are welcome to check it by yourself). I also have a lot of material on my website russianfromrussia.com
teacher_info.teaching_style:
What is unique about my lessons?
I'm the only one here who makes interactive exercises for each student after each professional lesson.
Moreover, if you book a package of my professional lessons you will have an individual plan for your lessons before we begin and a detailed plan before each lesson. 
After getting the plan, you can write your suggestions to me, and I'll correct the plan according to your needs. 
I correct homeworks between the lessons, so that we could use our lesson time more productively. 
You can find more information about specific courses in the course descriptions.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Step by Step (Absolute Beginners to Elementary), homework with corrections and interactive exercises included
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a course for those who are just starting to learn Russian. We'll cover all the basics and will focus on conversation and improving functional vocabulary for everyday communication.

You will learn to
0. Read easy texts in Russian
1. Get acquainted/ Introduce yourself and other people
2. Start conversation with a person /Ask for a phone number/ Ask for repetition
3. Talk about everyday activities/ Tell time / Talk about your plans for a week
4. Make an appointment / Set a meeting
5. Talk about your family/ fill in registration forms
6. Ask people if they have something
7. Talk about your city/ Ask where to go / Understand signs of a city
8. Buy a ticket for metro / Order in a restaurant
9. Refuse or accept an offer
10. Say where you were yesterday
11. Talk about countries/ Ask a person where he/she is from
12. Talk about the weather / seasons
13. Describe your house
14. Talk about your hobbies
15. Explain what you need to buy/ Talk about food preferences.
16. Talk about recepies/ Invite friends for dinner/ Express admiration or criticism
17. Talk to a doctor/ Talk about your health/ Give recommendations
18. Talk about mood and emotions
19. Talk about people's character
20. Describe appearance/ Buy clothes
21. Talk to a taxi driver
22. Talk about your trip. Describe cities

We'll use Google docs during our lessons, and these notes will be your study material to revise later.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian Step by Step (Low-Intermediate, Intermediate, Advanced);  homework with corrections and interactive exercises included
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is designed for those who are ready to move beyond a basic-level course. The goal is to improve your understanding and fluency in Russian based around your interests. 
After our initial trial lesson, I will plan lessons designed for you. You will have the plan 1-2 days before our lesson. 
Each lesson includes grammar and conversational parts, and  recommendations about listening.
You'll get your homework (an interactive exercise) after each lesson, as well as your homework assignment for our next language session.

We'll use Google docs during our lessons, and these notes will be your study material to revise later.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian through Storytelling (for low-intermediate, intermediate, upper-intermediate and advanced learners)
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a course for those who don't like routine. 
During our lesson, I'll start telling you an interesting story. When answering my questions, you won't just repeat what I've told you: that's not what is called storytelling. You'll be able to discover the plot by yourself, and you'll be able to learn vocabulary and grammar on the way.
Each lesson includes lesson notes and homework and my correction after the lesson.
For preparing a story for you, I should know a bit about your level of Russian; that's why I'm asking you to write me a message before our class, with some information about you and about your learning journey.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian through Russian Movies
pro_course_detail.description:
NEW! This is my new course for those who like watching movies and who prefer to learn by seeing the language being used in a natural context. 
I will send you the lesson plan (in google docs) 24 h before the lesson, with a short film fragment, the lesson's vocabulary, grammar comments and some questions.
During the lesson, we'll duscuss the fragment, learn how to use new vocabulary and grammar. You'll get the transcript of the movie fragment. You'll also have vocabulary and grammar exercises as your homework (it will be checked and corrected by me within a few days after the lesson).

Hello everyone, I am Alisa and I am a teacher of the Japanese language. As a teacher I am energetic and friendly - I always support my students, because I  do often "walk in the shoes" of a student and think that in today's world you can't live without continuing education.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
・Кому я подойду как репетитор?
 
 Всем тем, кто хочет изучать язык с нуля или со среднего уровня, а также тем, у кого японский - это необходимый язык для работы/учёбы в университете. Я также могу помочь с японским тем, кто хочет переехать в Японию и поступить в языковую школу, так как я сама прошла этот путь от 0 до уверенного владения языком.


Who would I fit as a tutor?

 For those who want to learn the language from scratch/intermediate level, as well as for those who need Japanese for work/university studies. I can also help with Japanese for those who want to move to Japan or enroll in a language school because I have experienced that myself.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Как я уже упомянула в видео - у меня мягкий и гибкий способ преподавания. Я использую не только классические учебники (которые очень важны), но и дополнительный материал.Я могу подстраиваться под ваши нужды/интересы и делать тематические уроки. Ведь, всегда хочется говорить больше - когда вы говорите на любимую тему. И это прекрасно.

As I mentioned in the video - I have a gentle and flexible way of teaching. I use not only classic textbooks (which are very important) but also supplementary material. I can adjust to your needs/interests and do themed lessons. In my opinion, people always want to talk more, when they talk about a topic they like. And that is great!

My name is Ina. I am from Belarus. My native languages is Russian.  
I love learning from other cultures and I'm very interested in languages. 
I really enjoy sharing my knowledge with others since that way I can also learn. I work as a teacher for more than 7 years now. 
I invite you to contact me, so you can start exploring the wonderful world of Russian language.

Russian
Меня зовут Инна. Я из Беларуси. Я люблю изучать и говорить на иностранных языках. 
Я буду рада поделиться с вами своими знаниями. 
Со мной вы не только научитесь понимать русский язык, но и говорить на нём. 
Свяжитесь со мной и давайте вместе изучать замечательный, русский язык.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a very patient and friendly teacher. 
I want to transmit the passion I feel to teaching and we can explore together different learning methods according to your needs. 
I recommend interesting channels on the Internet (like www.russianincontext.com :-) ) , YouTube, so that the student can listen to russian every day.

Communication is the most important thing. 
During my lessons the student (YOU) will be able to speak from the very first lesson.

Check my website www.russianincontext.com. 
There you will find the podcast and videos for beginners (A1 - A2); 
intermediate (A2 - B1), 
advanced (B1 - C1).  

Let me know which level you have got. 
See you in my class.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
English
Conversation is one of the main elements of my class, in this way we practice pronunciation, vocablurary, fluency and grammar. 
My classes are dynamic, interesting and customized accordingly to the student's goals and objectives. 
You will learn Russian that you can use in any situation and context. 
I will teach you not only to understand this language but also to talk in it. 

Разговорная речь является одним из основных элементов моих уроков, именно так мы практикуем произношение, словарный запас и грамматику. Мои уроки динамичны, интересны и соответствует целям учеников. 
Вы выучите русский язык, который можно использовать в любой ситуации и в любом контексте. Русский в контексте!

cert_info.description:
Certificate: Took the course "Methods of teaching Russian as a foreign language at the International Centre of Russian Language. 
P.S.: I have got the new last name. The copy of my passport i will send to you also. Best regards. Ina Kirchner (Azebaze Kenfack before)

course_info.trial_description: Let´s get to know each other and talk from the first minute in russian! Давайте познакомимся и будем поговорим на русском языке с первой минуты!

pro_course_detail.title: Let's talk in Russian! Conversation + corrections. Progress every day! /  Разговорные занятия: Говори по русски с 1 дня
pro_course_detail.description:
Русский
Разговорные занятия - это возможность для вас практиковать русский язык, а также слушать и понимать его. Во время этих уроков мы обсудим темы, которые вам интересны или/или актуальные темы. Хотя эти курсы посвящены практике разговорной речи, я все же могла бы объяснить некоторые моменты грамматики или спряжения. Если вы хотите поговорить на конкретную тему, пожалуйста, дайте мне знать.

Улучшите свои навыки общения на руском языке, уделяя особое внимание разговорной речи, произношению и граматике в контексте. С упражнениями, по желанию!
После первого урока со мной я доступен 24 часа в сутки, 7 дней в неделю для всех ваших вопросов, связанных с нашими уроками или с русским языком.


English

Conversation classes are an opportunity for you to practice russian but also to listen and understand it. During these lessons we will discuss topics that are interesting for you or / and current topics. Although these courses are dedicated to the practice of conversation, I could still explain some points of grammar or conjugation. If you want to talk about a specific topic, please let me know.

After a first lesson with me, I am available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for all your questions relating to our lessons or to russian.
Improve your Russian communication skills with a particular focus on speaking, pronunciation and grammar correction in context. With exercises!

pro_course_detail.title: Особый метод изучения русского языка! A special method of learning Russian!
pro_course_detail.description:
На этом курсе я поделюсь с тобой методом и техникой изучения языков и особенно русского языка. После первого урока со мной я доступен 24 часа в сутки, 7 дней в неделю для всех ваших вопросов, связанных с нашими уроками или с русским языком.

 In this course, I will share with you the method and technique of learning languages and especially the Russian language.

pro_course_detail.title: Let us talk about the grammar! Verbs, verbs are easy!
pro_course_detail.description:
Easy! Ask me any question! We learn in context like always.  Грамматика это легко, если её понимаешь! С примерами! Мы разберём граматику на примерах. Повторим падежи, глаголы движения (идти - ходить. ехать - ездить и так далее), предлоги, местоимения и так дапее.
Например: Нельзя зайти в аудиторию - идёт экзамен! Где ошибка и почему?

teacher_info.intro: Hello there! My name is Alisa. I was born in Russia and have always loved to travel. Now Im living in a wonderful city of Istanbul, Turkey.  I'm an easy-going person, I like to meet new people and visit different countries to explore their culture and traditions. As well as traveling I love learning languages. I know English and now I am studying Turkish and Spanish.
teacher_info.short_signature: Let's learn and speak Russian with fun!
teacher_info.about_me: Hello there! My name is Alisa. I was born in Russia and have always loved to travel. Now Im living in a wonderful city of Istanbul, Turkey.  I'm an easy-going person, I like to meet new people and visit different countries to explore their culture and traditions. As well as traveling I love learning languages. I know English and now I am studying Turkish and Spanish.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I know how difficult it is to start speaking in a foreign language, that is why on my lessons I'm always happy to answer a variety of questions and give all the explanation so you would be able to use it confidantely. I have different materials which we can use on the lesson and if you have topics you would like to learn and understand better I will always prepare the main information and explain you on the lesson.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
If you are just going to start to learn Russian, I will give you the most important information so you would be able to speak after first lesson. We will not focus only on grammar for hours but always gonna practice through the dialoges with the main rules which I will explain you.
And if you want to practice we can talk about different kind of things as Russian culture, traveling, literature, movies, music and I can assure you we'll never have any issues with finding a topic :)

course_info.trial_description: Hi my friend! Let's try this chance. On this lesson you can tell me all the goals you have and in the future we can work on them together! See you :)

pro_course_detail.title: For beginners \ Для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description: In the first lesson we are going to take a look at the Russian alphabet and read some introductory words that cover all these letters. I will also provide words which are similar in English to compare the difference in pronunciation, and useful words so you will be able to make short sentences after the first few lessons. If you happen to be familiar with the Russian alphabet already then we can begin to discuss the main grammatic rules and try to improve your conversational skills with small talk to start with.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice \ Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description: In our conversational lessons we can discuss any topic you'd like to. Or if you're unsure you can leave it to me and I'll provide useful and interesting topics for us to talk about. During these lessons I will write down the words and phrases which we use into an organised list in a document for you to practice. Please feel free to ask any questions about grammar. We can discuss it at any time.

teacher_info.intro: As a Ph.D. student of the Graduate School of Education at Peking University, I am willing to try myself as a community tutor. As a passionate traveler and blogger, I hope to bring joy and excitement to learners worldwide.
teacher_info.short_signature: Ph.D. student of the Graduate School of Education at Peking University teaching English and Russian
teacher_info.about_me: As a Ph.D. student of the Graduate School of Education at Peking University, I am willing to try myself as a community tutor. As a passionate traveler and blogger, I hope to bring joy and excitement to learners worldwide.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Knowledge gained during my studies and experience in research and teaching perfectly matches italki requirements. I am familiar with international education development to achieve Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) 4, the global education goal. Proficiency in Chinese, English, French, Latvian, and Russian languages helps me to research in these languages and communicate my results to an international audience. Moreover, I have the 180h Advanced Certificate in Teaching English as a Foreign Language (TEFL) and Advanced Certificates in Teaching Mindfulness.
teacher_info.teaching_style: In my class, I work with enthusiasm and positivity. I’m interested in many different topics, and I’m happy to focus on my learners’ individual goals and needs.

pro_course_detail.title: Mindful university/job application
pro_course_detail.description:
Have you found your dream university or job? Or are you still looking for one? This Business English course will help you to prepare your application and answer the following questions:
1) How to mindfully choose your future university or job following your career path? 
2) How to assess your and your future university's/companie's values and goals? 
3) How to prepare a SMART application? 
4) How to adjust your CV and motivation letter for a specific position? 
5) How to successfully pass the interview?
6) How to establish relationships within the new environment
